JUDGES: Françoise Tulkens;Ireneu Cabral Barreto;Nona Tsotsoria;Vladimiro Zagrebelsky
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lived in GPE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant bought a plot of land ( plot no . CARDINAL in the GPE , in LOC of GPE ) from the heirs of ORG

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( “ the Ministry ” ) brought an action before ORG , requesting the annulment of the title deed of the applicant to plot no . CARDINAL and its registration in the ORG 's name , claiming that it had had actual possession of this land since DATE . ORG primarily relied on LAW no . ORG ) . ORG also alleged that an expropriation had been effected in relation to the said land in DATE and that ORG had received compensation for it . However , the land register had not been amended due to an administrative error .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG accepted the request of ORG and ordered that the land be registered in favour of the ORG in accordance with LAW no . ORG . In its judgment , the first - instance court noted that ORG had been in actual possession of this land for DATE and that the applicant had been aware of this fact when he had bought the plot .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld the judgment of DATE .
CARDINAL . The applicant requested rectification of the decision of DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG dismissed the applicant 's request .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG decision was served on the applicant .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG annulled LAW no . ORG .
CARDINAL . A full description of the domestic law may be found in GPE ( Çökmez ) and Others v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § § DATE , DATE ) .
